alert.note: Alert for Hudson (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 09 at 3:49AM EST until January 10 at 6:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Hudson County. In New York, Southern Westchester, New York (Manhattan) and Bronx Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
